00029 __inline bool veryNearS(refVector &r1, refVector &r2)
00030 {
00031         if (r1.refno!=r2.refno)
00032                 return false;
00033         if (r1.refno==-1 && r2.refno==-1)
00034                 return true;

00036                 return false;

00038                 return false;
00039         return true;

00042 __inline bool veryNearD(CodingPictInfo *cpi, refVector &r1, refVector &r2)
00043 {
00044         if (r1.refno==-1 && r2.refno==-1)
00045                 return true;

00049                 return false;
